name: Dreamise
tag_list: dreams, wishes, challenge, competition, game, social, consumer, mobile
overview: Dreamise in an unique service that realize your dream if it cool. People post their dreams and discover other’s wishes. All dreams has a Rating which depends on number of votes and comments on them and an owner’s rating. If you like anyone’s dream you can vote for it and that will help both of you, coz when you vote for a dream or comment on it you also raising up your own Personal Rating. So everyones help each other make their dreams come true. Every month top rated dreams will be sponsored by Dreamise. Also anyone can realize any liked dream by himself. So Dreamise is about make this world better.
